description:
Drop Pop is an addictive and relaxing game that is easy to play and hard to stop. Drop colorful balls, connect the same ones, and watch them turn into bigger balls. Every move feels satisfying and rewarding.

Enjoy smooth and calming gameplay with no pressure, no timers, and no stress. Play at your own pace - relax for a few minutes or spend hours having fun and improving your skills.

Think you can do better? In Drop Pop, you can beat high scores and challenge records set by other players. Plan your moves, aim for bigger merges, and climb higher on the leaderboard.
